name: Mini-Micro-Ninja
description:
A game where the guards can't see you, only hear you.
You have to get to the Target to assassinate it
Play as long as you want, it gets harder in higher Levels

I suggest downloading since WebGL version is laggy
Download, start MiniMicro.Exe and enjoy

made with Mini Micro (https://joestrout.itch.io/mini-micro)

source under: https://gitlab.com/OrangeCoke/game-jam-april-fourth
